job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Integrate Generative AI into existing applications and workflows
   * Collaborate with ML scientist and engineers to Research, design and develop cutting-edge generative AI algorithms to address real-world challenges
   * Work across customer engagement to understand what adoption patterns for generative AI are working and rapidly share them across teams and leadership
   * Interact with customers directly to understand the business problem, help and aid them in implementation of generative AI solutions, deliver briefing and deep dive sessions to customers and guide customer on adoption patterns and paths for generative AI
   * Create and deliver reusable technical assets that help to accelerate the adoption of generative AI on various platform
   * Create and deliver best practice recommendations, tutorials, blog posts, sample code, and presentations adapted to technical, business, and executive stakeholder
   * Provide customer and market feedback to Product and Engineering teams to help define product direction.
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer

* Integrate Generative AI into existing applications and workflows
   * Collaborate with ML scientist and engineers to Research, design and develop cutting-edge generative AI algorithms to address real-world challenges
   * Work across customer engagement to understand what adoption patterns for generative AI are working and rapidly share them across teams and leadership
   * Interact with customers directly to understand the business problem, help and aid them in implementation of generative AI solutions, deliver briefing and deep dive sessions to customers and guide customer on adoption patterns and paths for generative AI
   * Create and deliver reusable technical assets that help to accelerate the adoption of generative AI on various platform
   * Create and deliver best practice recommendations, tutorials, blog posts, sample code, and presentations adapted to technical, business, and executive stakeholder
   * Provide customer and market feedback to Product and Engineering teams to help define product direction.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the integration of Generative AI into applications and workflows, research and development of generative AI algorithms, and direct customer interaction for implementing generative AI solutions. It also highlights creating technical assets, best practices, and providing feedback to product teams, all of which align with the core responsibilities and typical projects of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and deploying user-facing AI systems.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Research, design and develop cutting-edge generative AI algorithms' directly relates to the creation and adaptation of AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Research, design and develop cutting-edge generative AI algorithms

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Integrate Generative AI into existing applications and workflows' implies building and deploying AI features into software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrate Generative AI into existing applications and workflows

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'Work across customer engagement to understand what adoption patterns for generative AI are working' and 'Interact with customers directly to understand the business problem' indicate a need to understand business context and customer needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Work across customer engagement to understand what adoption patterns for generative AI are working

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'help and aid them in implementation of generative AI solutions, deliver briefing and deep dive sessions to customers and guide customer on adoption patterns and paths for generative AI' show an understanding of business problems and translating them into technical solutions for customers.
job_tasks.phrase: help and aid them in implementation of generative AI solutions, deliver briefing and deep dive sessions to customers and guide customer on adoption patterns and paths for generative AI

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Create and deliver reusable technical assets that help to accelerate the adoption of generative AI on various platform' suggests building software components or tools for wider use.
job_tasks.phrase: Create and deliver reusable technical assets that help to accelerate the adoption of generative AI on various platform

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Create and deliver best practice recommendations, tutorials, blog posts, sample code, and presentations adapted to technical, business, and executive stakeholder' involves communicating technical information to various business stakeholders.
job_tasks.phrase: Create and deliver best practice recommendations, tutorials, blog posts, sample code, and presentations adapted to technical, business, and executive stakeholder

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Provide customer and market feedback to Product and Engineering teams to help define product direction' indicates understanding market needs and influencing product strategy.
job_tasks.phrase: Provide customer and market feedback to Product and Engineering teams to help define product direction
